summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3335, for the improvement of the alley in block 29, Sarah A. Bell's 2nd Addition, being the alley between 8th Avenue and 9th Avenue, and extending from Pine Street to Olive Street, all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 41180 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
